OutputInfoUtility¶

class orbitpy.util.OutputInfoUtility[source]¶

Class with utility classes, functions to handle the output-info objects, i.e. objects of the classes:

  • orbitpy.propagator.PropagatorOutputInfo

  • orbitpy.contactfinder.ContactFinderOutputInfo

  • orbitpy.coveragecalculator.CoverageOutputInfo

  • orbitpy.datametricscalculator.DataMetricsOutputInfo

  • orbitpy.eclipsefinder.EclipseFinderOutputInfo

  • orbitpy.grid.GridOutputInfo

Methods Summary

__init__()

delete_output_info_object_in_list(...)

Remove an output-info object from list of output-info objects which has "loose"-equality with the other output-info object.

locate_output_info_object_in_list(...)

Locate an output-info object from list of output-info objects with parameters as that given by the input arguments.

Methods Documentation

__init__()¶
static delete_output_info_object_in_list(out_info_list, other_out_info_object)[source]¶

Remove an output-info object from list of output-info objects which has “loose”-equality with the other output-info object. Loose equality requires only some of the instance variables of the two objects to match. Please see the check_loose_equality function of the respective output-info class to know which instance variables care compared.

Parameters

  • out_info_list – List of output-info objects.

  • other_out_info_object (output-info object or list, output-info object) – Output-info object(s) with which comparison for loose-equality shall be made. Can be a list.

Paramtype

list, output-info objects

Returns

(Potentially) reduced list of output-info objects with an deleted object.

Return type

list, output-info objects

static locate_output_info_object_in_list(out_info_list, out_info_type, **kwargs)[source]¶

Locate an output-info object from list of output-info objects with parameters as that given by the input arguments.

Parameters

  • out_info_list – List of output-info objects.

  • out_info_type (orbitpy.util.OutputInfoUtility.OutputInfoType) – The type of the output-info object.

  • **kwargs –

    Keyword arguments. Depending on the output-info type of interest, there are different keywords expected.

    Output-info type

    Keyword(s)

    Description

    PropagatorOutputInfo

    spacecraft_id

    Spacecraft-identifier of the propagated spacecraft.

    CoverageOutputInfo

    inp_cov_type, spacecraft_id, inp_instru_id, inp_mode_id, inp_grid_id

    Coverage-type and identifiers of spacecraft, instrument, mode, grid.

Paramtype

list, output-info objects

Returns

The output-info object with parameters matched to the input arguments.

Return type

output-info object
